        public float getAvergeTemperature()
        Returns the average temperature readings of the sensors installed in the room.
        Returns:

      • hasThing

        public boolean hasThing(itec3030.smarthome.standards.SmartThing s)
        Returns true if an object implementing a SmartThing interface is found in the room.
        Parameters:
        s - Reference to an objects that implements SmartThing.
        Returns:
        True if the Thing is installed in the room. Currently checks only the collection of temperature sensors.
